p: The out-of-sample prediction for dengue epidemics in Zhongshan from 28 th December 2013 to 26 th December 2014 (52 weeks in total) was showed in Fig 6 and summarized in Table 2. The predictive model performed well in generating early warnings of dengue epidemics at the epidemic threshold of 3 cases per week, with 94.12% sensitivity and 91.43% specificity.
